languages.text: {n}Вам на ум приходит элегантная формулировка приговора, которая убедит всех в вашей правоте и позволит не прослыть святоубийцей. Надо всего лишь обвинить кардинала в намерении убить почти канонизированное лицо.{/n}

{n}You devise an elegant rendering of the sentence, one that will convince everyone that you are in the right, and save you from being branded a saint-killer. All you must do is accuse the cardinal of intending to murder an all-but-canonised individual.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам на ум приходит элегантная формулировка приговора, которая убедит всех в вашей правоте и позволит не прослыть святоубийцей. Надо всего лишь обвинить кардинала в намерении убить почти канонизированное лицо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You think of an elegant wording of the sentence that will convince everyone that you are in the right, rather than to saddle you with a saint-killer's reputation. All you have to do is accuse the cardinal of an intent to murder an all-but-sainted man.{/n}

{n}You think of an elegant wording of the sentence that will convince everyone that you are in the right, rather than to saddle you with a saint-killer's reputation. All you have to do is accuse the cardinal of an intent to murder an all-but-sainted man.{/n}

{n}You devise an elegant rendering of the sentence, one that will convince everyone that you are in the right, and save you from being branded a saint-killer. All you must do is accuse the cardinal of intending to murder an all-but-canonised individual.{/n}

{n}You devise an elegant rendering of the sentence, one that will convince everyone that you are in the right, and save you from being branded a saint-killer. All you must do is accuse the cardinal of intending to murder an all-but-canonised individual.{/n}

{n}You devise an elegant rendering of the sentence, one that will convince everyone that you are in the right, and save you from being branded a saint-killer. All you must do is accuse the cardinal of intending to murder an all-but-canonised individual.{/n}

{n}You devise an elegant rendering of the sentence, one that will convince everyone that you are in the right, and save you from being branded a saint-killer. All you must do is accuse the cardinal of intending to murder an all-but-canonised individual.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du überlegst dir eine elegante Begründung für das Urteil, die alle überzeugen wird, dass du im Recht bist, und dich davor bewahrt, einen Heiligen zu töten. Du musst lediglich den Kardinal beschuldigen, ein so gut wie heiliggesprochenes Individuum ermorden zu wollen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You devise an elegant rendering of the sentence, one that will convince everyone that you are in the right, and save you from being branded a saint-killer. All you must do is accuse the cardinal of intending to murder an all-but-canonised individual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du überlegst dir eine elegante Begründung für das Urteil, die alle überzeugen wird, dass du im Recht bist, und dich davor bewahrt, einen Heiligen zu töten. Du musst lediglich den Kardinal beschuldigen, ein so gut wie heiliggesprochenes Individuum ermorden zu wollen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous échafaudez une pirouette qui vous permettra de prononcer la sentence de manière convaincante, sans pour autant passer pour l'assassin d'un saint homme. Tout ce que vous avez à faire, c'est d'accuser le cardinal de vouloir tuer un candidat à la canonisation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You devise an elegant rendering of the sentence, one that will convince everyone that you are in the right, and save you from being branded a saint-killer. All you must do is accuse the cardinal of intending to murder an all-but-canonised individual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous échafaudez une pirouette qui vous permettra de prononcer la sentence de manière convaincante, sans pour autant passer pour l'assassin d'un saint homme. Tout ce que vous avez à faire, c'est d'accuser le cardinal de vouloir tuer un candidat à la canonisation.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你想到了一个优雅的判决，这个判决既能让所有人信服，又能避免你的手沾上圣人的鲜血。你要做的事情，就是指控红衣主教企图谋杀一位除了未受册封之外，其他方面与圣人无异的人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You devise an elegant rendering of the sentence, one that will convince everyone that you are in the right, and save you from being branded a saint-killer. All you must do is accuse the cardinal of intending to murder an all-but-canonised individual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你想到了一个优雅的判决，这个判决既能让所有人信服，又能避免你的手沾上圣人的鲜血。你要做的事情，就是指控红衣主教企图谋杀一位除了未受册封之外，其他方面与圣人无异的人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ideas una sentencia elegante que convencerá a todos de que tu veredicto es justo y te librará de las consecuencias matar a un santo: solo tienes que acusar al cardenal de intentar asesinar a una persona prácticamente canonizada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You devise an elegant rendering of the sentence, one that will convince everyone that you are in the right, and save you from being branded a saint-killer. All you must do is accuse the cardinal of intending to murder an all-but-canonised individual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ideas una sentencia elegante que convencerá a todos de que tu veredicto es justo y te librará de las consecuencias matar a un santo: solo tienes que acusar al cardenal de intentar asesinar a una persona prácticamente canonizada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは巧妙な判決文を考案し、それによって自分が正しいと皆に納得させ、聖人殺しの汚名を免れるのだ。必要なのは、枢機卿がほぼ聖人認定された人物を殺害しようとしていたと非難することだけである。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You devise an elegant rendering of the sentence, one that will convince everyone that you are in the right, and save you from being branded a saint-killer. All you must do is accuse the cardinal of intending to murder an all-but-canonised individual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは巧妙な判決文を考案し、それによって自分が正しいと皆に納得させ、聖人殺しの汚名を免れるのだ。必要なのは、枢機卿がほぼ聖人認定された人物を殺害しようとしていたと非難することだけである。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu cezaya; herkesin gözünde seni haklı çıkaracak ve aziz katili damgası yemene engel olacak, akıllıca bir kılıf uydurmalısın. Tek yapman gereken, kardinali neredeyse kutsanmış birini öldürmeye teşebbüsle suçlamak.{/n}
